text: Chantolele ipaka (yaunami yangajaulila kungondo) pandema jachim'bujile kukwao. Jilani: “Nkatola ipaka, nganituŵa tunkulupilile jenumanja, Allah pamasile paatutagulile ya abali syenu, soni Allah chagaone masengo genu pamo ni Ntenga Jwakwe ﷺ, kaneka (panyuma pa kuwa kwenu) ni chachim'buchisya kwa Nkumanyilila yakusisika ni yakuonechela, basi ni taachintagulila pa ichindu yamwaliji nkupanganya.”
